reviewText: I love the movie but don't buy it for that price.  Watch if on youtube for free.

I teach middle school.  Every year we read the book, and then watch the movie to compare.  And every year I have former students come up to me and ask do I still have that movie, it was so good.  It is an unforgetable movie, and it is hard to find.

Hello, I am a teacher and we are currently reading the novel to this VHS.  It is quite sad to see the price of these.  I would love to show my students, but there is absolutely no way a teacher can afford a movie at this price! :(

So dissapointing.
I love this movie, but I want to know why in the world is it priced so damn high. 75 to 90 something dollars for a VHS no less. Ridiculous. Not worth it in my opinion!!!1

This video was overall very good. Do you ever remember the video's you watched when you were a child, this is one for some reason you will always remember. The plot is confusing, but once you finish it, you will adore it. It is sad, and scared me when I was younger, but I appreciated it... =)
